title: 172 - The Big Wet Butt Bandit
description: Today’s episode features a full crew that has some housekeeping to address. There appears to be a big wet butt bandit in the office and all the boys chime in on who the culprit is. The boys then jump right into the Pod FOD which is a folder that is compiled from all things around the insert. Todays folder jump into the latest shows and movies the boys have been watching, Mitt’s take on Outer Banks, a home made iron man mask, and wraps up with a Chett Hanx’s double DAHN. Make sure to subscribe to youtube.come/thepodpmi to watch full episodes and don't forget to send your submissions for the Pod FOD to @ThePodPMI on twitter and instagram. We appreciate you rocking with us and we'll see you Wednesday, Cheers.
